1/4lb custom blended Welcome Meats' beef n' bacon smash burger served on a brioche bun. Add an extra patty and/or enjoy with American cheese!

This 1/4lb custom-blended Welcome Meats' beef n' bacon smashburger is topped with smoked mozzarella cheese, vinegar slaw n' local green sauce (beauitful blend of local kale, argula, parsley n' garlic scape) n' served on a brioche bun. Stop drooling on your screens n' come see us at the truck.
We're not foolin' around with this one! Double 1/4lb patties layered with red onion, American cheese, Cup Truck secret sauce n' smashed again on a brioche bun.
What can we say? This all-beef burnt end dog aims to please! Try our "Top Shelf Wein": Topped with house dill relish n' house roasted jalapeno ranch.  It's like no other wein!
Watch your drool for this one...hoagie bun stuffed with diced mortadella, capicola, red onion, tomato, pepperoncini, smoked Gouda cheese, lettuce n' italian mayo!
Smoked ham gets cozy with herb ricotta, sweet-hot pepper jelly, and arugula—like a garden party with a spicy secret. Vegetarian?  No problem! We'll load you up with non-ham ingredients.
Just because it's fun to say. 4 wing n' drummies tossed in a local garlic scape-jalapeno sauce....What's not to love?
Fried to perfection n' seasoned with Seth's pantry of spices.
Not your 'pedestrian' mac n' cheese. Smoked Gouda n' American cheese topped with a special crunch

Dried cherries, toasted walnuts, manchego cheese n' hot honey bacon vinaigrette. Wholesome enough for a yoga retreat, wild enough for Rhythm of the River. Vegetarian? We'll skip the bacon n' top this salad with a local cider vinaigrette
Addie whips these cupcakes up from scratch n' donates $.50 from every cupcake to a local non-profit!

menu.item: Kookies for Kidneys - Cinnamon Almond Kookie
menu.desc: Inspired by her sister, Parker is raising money for a cause close to her heart...n' kidneys! Try Parker's Kookies for Kidneys! This week's flavor is chocolate chip. Parker received a life-saving kidney transplant at 6 years old. At 7, she is now raising money for CKD research!
No one is sad about rhubarb season! Enjoy this fresh n' local rhubarb crisp baked perfectly in a 5-inch round pan. Enough for 2 people, or 1 lover of rhubarb!
Think cake-pop, but made with crushed Oreos on a stick with crunchy chocolate coating.
Crushed Oreo base, homemade chocolate layer topped with creamy Reese's Peanut Butter Cup ice cream n' more crushed Oreos n' homemade chocolate sauce.
Sun-kissed June n' everbearing strawberries picked fresh from our garden, churned with sweet n' creamy buttermilk into frozen perfection.
Bright, zesty lemon poppyseed cake—like sunshine in cake form
